content:
I'm trying to write something just like the streaming iterator example:
https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=03a5e947daf22ea546aa67bab822929f

But it errors: error[E0109]: lifetime arguments are not allowed for this type
Is this a known bug? Or am i writing the code wrong?Question about generic associated lifetime
As far as I know, GATs are not fully implemented yet so no code that uses them will actually work.
Sorry about that. People are working on it!
I'm using https://docs.rs/galemu now as a workaround.
